EXTERNAL_RETURN_PORTAL.features: Form for withdrawal from the purchase contract; for registered customers, return products directly in the customer account in 'Moje objednávky' section.

SUMMARY: Notino offers a money-back guarantee. If you want to return unused goods, send them back and they will refund the full price. You have 90 days to return the goods. You can use a form for withdrawal from the purchase contract, or registered customers can return products directly in their customer account under 'Moje objednávky'.
